name: PewPewPew DEFENDOR
description:
Mouse 1 or CTRL to PewPewPew. WASD to DEFENDOR.

Survive and score high, thus getting a High Score! which is more or less a score that is objectively high. You're accountable to take your own screenshots, the game can't be bothered to be saving that $#%@!

This game uses donation-ware assets found on Itch, as well as some advanced home-made voice acting. The creator humbly thanks those responsible.
